bibl.title: Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Coll. privées: P. Schøyen Inv. MS 244/1 recto = P. Thomas 21
COLES Revel A. and Roger S.O. TOMLIN, 296 Drachmas for Each Soldier: MS Schøyen 244/1 recto.
Traianos GAGOS and Roger S. BAGNALL (Edd.), Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas = American Studies in Papyrology. 42 (Oakville, Connecticut, 2001) pp. 187-201 et pl. 17.
